statements: UPDATE QualityControlChecks SET compliance_notes = 'Passed' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE QualityControlChecks SET result = FALSE, check_type = 'Final' WHERE stage = 'Final Check';
UPDATE QualityControlChecks SET compliance_notes = 'Passed all quality checks' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE QualityControlChecks SET result = false, compliance_notes = 'Failed quality control check' WHERE stage = 'Final' AND check_type = 'Compliance';
UPDATE production_quality_checks SET stage_name = 'Final Inspection', check_status = TRUE, check_description = 'Final quality check before shipment' WHERE check_id = 1
UPDATE compliance_results SET compliance_status = TRUE, result_details = 'Product passed all quality checks' WHERE result_id = 5
UPDATE production_quality_checks SET check_description = 'Updated description' WHERE check_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_results SET compliance_status = TRUE, result_details = 'Revised details' WHERE result_id = 5;
UPDATE quality_check SET performed_by = 'Team A' WHERE check_id = 1;
UPDATE check_result SET result = 'Pass' WHERE result_id = 2;
UPDATE production_stage SET stage_name = 'Refining Stage' WHERE stage_id = 1;
UPDATE check_result SET result = 'Failed' WHERE check_id = 2 AND stage_id = 3;
UPDATE stage_1_checks SET check_result='Pass' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE stage_3_checks SET check_result='Fail', check_date='2022-05-15' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE stage_1_checks SET check_result = 'Pass', check_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE stage_3_checks SET check_result = 'Fail', check_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction SET check_result = TRUE WHERE id = 1
UPDATE QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction SET stage_of_production = 'Final Inspection', check_type = 'Visual Inspection' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction SET check_result = true, stage_of_production = 'Final Stage' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE QualityControlChecksAtDifferentStagesOfProduction SET check_type = 'Visual Inspection', check_result = false WHERE id = 2
